title: Carrot, apple and butternut squash soup
ingredients: ['30g butter', '2 large leeks (white and pale green parts only), chopped', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 large potato, peeled and cubed', '275g cubed butternut squash', '2 to 3 carrots, diced', '1 Granny Smith apple, peeled, cored, and sliced', '1 litre chicken stock', '4 tablespoons dry white wine (optional)', '125ml single cream', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives']
